value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What should our next move be? We
have no time to waste.$k$pThe question is: what might we gain
by exploring this world further?$k$pWe may be better off returning to
the realm of the dead...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If it's all right with you, Commander
Anna, I'd like to search the castle's
library.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|We searched our own library, and
learned nothing that might help
us defeat Hel...$k$pDo you think things might be
different here?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I do. Even if we don't learn anything
about how to defeat Hel, we may
learn something about THIS Askr...$k$pEven basic facts, like what year
it is—or what exactly happened here.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|I can see the merit in that. And if it
was Hel who brought this Askr to
ruin, we could learn something vital.$k$pI'm certain that there must be some
information about Hel there... Let's
go!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|You're persistent. But so is
death. Sooner or later, all of
you will perish.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I know this place so well. I can barely
tell the difference between this world
and our own...$k$p$EFace_Smile|For tonight, we'll rest in the fortress
on the hill ahead. I do love it so!$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Askr, laid waste...$k$pIt's difficult to accept the evidence
of my eyes. One thing in particular
bothers me...$k$pI suspect—$k$p$EFace_Pain|!?$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Sbs50|$Fo200,255,255,255,255|$Fi200|$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Die. Now.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Líf! Argh...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse?$k$pDon't you dare! If you want to kill my
brother, you'll have to kill me first!$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Pain|You... Move.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Foe sighted! Enemy attack!$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|And he's gone! Can it be?$k$pI apologize. I was careless... I didn't
anticipate that he'd simply try to
assassinate me.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Never mind that. Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thanks to you, I am.$k$pAnd I learned something, too...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Líf hesitated for just a moment
before pointing his weapon at
you. I wonder what that's about.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|You're right...$k$pPerhaps it was chivalry. Maybe he
won't fight a woman...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|That seems unlikely.$k$pIt must be something else...$k$p$Sbs150|
